elements.title: Bridgeman Island (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Bridgeman Island (pictured) was the first volcano in Antarctica to be seen erupting?

elements.title: provatura (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that provatura cheese was mentioned in a 12th-century chronicle?

elements.title: J. Lewis Crozer Library (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that when the J. Lewis Crozer Library was founded in 1769, it had 163 books?

elements.title: Lee Fook Hong (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Singaporean broadcaster Lee Fook Hong legally changed his name to Lee Dai Sor (literally 'Lee Big Fool' in Cantonese) after being accused of tax evasion?

elements.title: Aubinadong River (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Aubinadong River in Ontario, Canada, was an indigenous canoe route and is still used for canoe camping as its main recreational activity?

elements.title: 2023 gun control ordinance (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Indianapolis's 2023 gun control ordinance – which bans assault weapons, among other measures – is a trigger law that only goes into effect if Indiana's state preemption law is repealed or struck down?

elements.title: Masquerade Suite (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the waltz from Khachaturian's Masquerade Suite has been called "spooky" and is often played for Halloween?
